I'd highly recommend "Hitch" for you! This movie is a fascinating documentary that revisits one of the most iconic meetings in cinema history between Alfred Hitchcock and François Truffaut. It's an intriguing exploration of their conversation and the potential insights they could have shared about filmmaking.

If you're interested in a drama with a touch of romance, "Restless" might be right up your alley. This film follows the story of two characters, Ari and Tiina, as they navigate through relationships and their last summer of freedom. Mia Wasikowska and Hayley Atwell deliver captivating performances that are definitely worth watching!
